name: One Man Tag
description:
One-Man Hide and Seek is a 3D, single-player experience, composed of puzzle levels and chase sequences based on the creepy pasta One-Man Hide and Seek.  

To complete the ritual, Carl, the game's protagonist, will need to do some puzzles to get the necessary ingredients.

After the ritual is done, he will need to respond to the consequences of involving himself and those close to him with the dark arts.  

Will you survive?!
